title: StorySearchAI Content Item
description: Schema for a single content item in StorySearchAI, designed for AI-powered discovery.

id.description: Unique identifier for the content item.

title.description: Main title of the content item.

slug.description: URL-friendly slug for the content item.

description.description: A brief summary or meta description of the content.

full_text_content.description: Comprehensive text content for AI analysis and search. This would typically be the full body of an article, product description, or video transcript.

image_url.description: URL to a primary image associated with the content.

url.description: Canonical URL to the content item.

tags.description: Keywords or tags associated with the content for better discoverability.

related_entities.description: Other entities (people, brands, products) related to this content item.

brand_or_person.description: The main brand or person this content item is about.

author.description: Author or creator of the content.
